topic.title: Supported Operating Systems
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase Server is supported on numerous popular operating systems and virtual environments.

body.p: Certified: Couchbase has performed an extensive testing and review process to make sure that Couchbase Server runs well out of the box on the specified platform.

Supported: Couchbase believes that Couchbase Server will run well out of the box on the specified platform, but extensive testing has not been performed. Couchbase will make a best effort to investigate issues on a Supported platform version, but it is recommended that you run Couchbase on a Certified platform version.

table.title: Supported Operating Systems for Development, Testing, and Production

body.p: * Amazon Linux is only supported when it is run using the official Couchbase Server AMI on AWS.
** Only the Red Hat Compatible Kernel (RHCK) is supported. The Unbreakable Enterprise Kernel (UEK) is not supported.
